name: Diggidy
description:
Jack Pikax is looking for his treasure !
Help him find it by digging tunnels but be warned, for the underground is dangerous !
Be as fast as possible in your quest, your time is limited !

How To Play :

Right click to dig
Mouse to choose where to dig
WASD or directional arrows to move

Credits :

Epic devs : LeexX and Witcher

Design : KAMBDY

Art : Alcy
